title: United Kingdom Inactivity Rate
description: Inactivity Rate in the United Kingdom remained unchanged at 21.70 percent in August from 21.70 percent in July of 2022. Inactivity Rate in the United Kingdom averaged 23.20 percent from 1971 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 25.90 percent in March of 1983 and a record low of 20.20 percent in January of 2020. In the United Kingdom, the inactivity rate refers to those aged from 16 to 64 not in employment who have not been seeking work within the last 4 weeks and/or are unable to start work within the next 2 weeks. This page includes a chart with historical data for the United Kingdom Inactivity Rate.
author: Office for National Statistics
